name: Root Canel
description: Root canal treatment is a dental procedure that relieves pain caused by an infected or abscessed tooth.

name: Alignment Teeth
description: The teeth alignment is done by wearing a series of aligners, each for two weeks at a time.

name: Cosmetic Teeth
description: Common cosmetic dental services include teeth whitening,tooth and gum contouring.

name: Oral Hygiene
description: Oral hygiene is the practice of keeping your mouth clean and disease-free. It involves brushing and flossing your teeth.

name: Live Advisory
description: Receive clear reports, chat transcripts and keep track of every new lead. Stand out in the eyes of your prospects.

name: Cavity Inspection
description: The cavities should be at least 2 inches wide. It is also important to know whether is in good condition.
